Articles.Content: I don't know what to do, the ksp ps4 edition seems to be really out of shape, I was planning to have a backup plan of the PC game, but it doesn't work now, I can't get a refund, because I am not old enough, and the only game I have at all is minecraft, which is the only game I will EVER get. And I am already bored of that ALREADY, I am going to buy the ksp ps4 within the month, what should i do?

12 minutes ago, KerbalXcer said:

I don't know what to do, the ksp ps4 edition seems to be really out of shape, I was planning to have a backup plan of the PC game, but it doesn't work now, I can't get a refund, because I am not old enough, and the only game I have at all is minecraft, which is the only game I will EVER get. And I am already bored of that ALREADY, I am going to buy the ksp ps4 within the month, what should i do? 

 

 

I would not recommend buying KSP for PS4, there are a number of well-documented bugs and other issues that you will almost certainly run into. I hear they're being worked on, but in any case there isn't a patch fixing them yet. So I suggest you wait and see.
Indeed, the console patch seems to have too many bugs etc. Every day some angry console user starts a new thread about how bad it is and that they want a refund.

10 hours ago, DuoDex said:

I would not recommend buying KSP for PS4, there are a number of well-documented bugs and other issues that you will almost certainly run into. I hear they're being worked on, but in any case there isn't a patch fixing them yet. So I suggest you wait and see.

I cannot, because my computer display isn't working!  And it runs ksp on it. So the only other option is the PS4, and I can never persuade them to get me OTHER games. So I'm stuck with the PS4,

PS (Here comes the wall of flaming bugs and glitches!

Isn't fixing the display a possibility? If you're asking for suggestions, mine is also 'don't get the PS4 version, yet'. At least, not until these things get sorted out.

Now, if your mind is already set that this is the only way... no one will hold you back!

50 minutes ago, KerbalXcer said:

I cannot, because my computer display isn't working!  And it runs ksp on it. So the only other option is the PS4, and I can never persuade them to get me OTHER games. So I'm stuck with the PS4,

PS (Here comes the wall of flaming bugs and glitches!

What's wrong with your computer display? Drivers, video card, or other issue?

4 hours ago, adsii1970 said:

What's wrong with your computer display? Drivers, video card, or other issue?

Beats me, here's my theory, RIP computer display
